solution_line_template: Half of {initial_cans} cans of sprinkles is {initial_cans}/{half_divisor}=<<{initial_cans}/{half_divisor}={half_cans}>>{half_cans} cans.
Three less than half as many cans of sprinkles is {half_cans}-{less_than_value}=<<{half_cans}-{less_than_value}={remaining_cans}>>{remaining_cans} cans of sprinkles.
